verse: सर्वं खल्विदं ब्रह्म तज्जलानिति शान्त उपासीत। अथ खलु क्रतुमयः पुरुषो यथाक्रतुरस्मिल्लोके पुरुषो भवति तथेतः प्रेत्य भवति स क्रतुं कुर्वीत॥
meaning-gpt: Meaning:Everything indeed is Brahman. Therefore, one should worship Brahman as water. Then, just as a person made of action becomes a person in this world, similarly after death, that person becomes their action. So, they should perform their action.
meaning: मरने के समय जिसका चिंतन होगा वही बनना पड़ेगा
